channel.title: Need help! How do i change xp pace?!
channel.description:
Need help on changing xp pace, so it slows down leveling alot.
Please help.
Thanks.

item.title: Need help! How do i change xp pace?!
item.dc:creator: @tedyslilnoob tedyslilnoob
item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

Do this, Get on a lvl 3, hit an npc once, and see how much xp you got, Eg 201 in client.java search 200 untill you find the correct one which is xp, thats what i did, and you onyl have to change one thing for att, hp, str etcc.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help! How do i change xp pace?!

item.title: Need help! How do i change xp pace?!
item.dc:creator: @Jonny_J Jonny J
item.description:
@Jonny_J wrote:

What about if you train on NPCs for xp? just do that to all Npc?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 09:50:28 PM[/size][hr]We are creating a new private server with own source, webclient etc, and we dont know how to slow down the xp rate so you dont train so fast on monsters, can you help us so we can change it and slow it down?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 09:51:58 PM[/size][hr]AnyBody??..

Read full topic
